name: Farm Solitaire Harvest Story
description:
Welcome to your farm located near the small town. Land here is so fruitful that everything grows extremely fast. Oh, it’s high time for harvest! Gather apples and other fruits & veggies.

And the other pastime of the local town villagers here is playing solitaire! This game helps to mix work and joy in this land.

- Beautiful farm for solitaire playing;
- Numerous levels with different layouts;
- Amazing prizes and rewards for wins.

SOLITAIRE SIMULATOR
Play classic solitaire, favourite game of people in this land. Don’t forget to lead your household, and keep the farm in order. This will be an amazing adventure!

FARMING LOCATION
Explore the great location of your farm. It’s high time for harvest and playing classic solitaire! These activities are closely connected in this town.

CARD LAYOUTS
Try all the variety of layouts with different cards to connect. Matching them you will be able to go further in your solitaire journey.

ACHIEVEMENTS
Get various achievements, during your solitaire journey. Play and get all of them. This game is full of mysteries.

PRIZES & DAILY REWARDS
Play this solitaire game and get rewards. Take a trip through the farm, play breathtaking solitaire levels and earn prizes.

SOLITAIRE HINTS
Use them when you have some difficulties during the card matching adventure. Hints of this solitaire game will help you to connect cards of the layouts.

One of the most exciting solitaire games is waiting for you. Play Farm Solitaire, pass through numerous levels and match solitaire cards.
